text:
Celebrations Are Still On! Here Are Some More Pictures From PC-Nick's Post-Wedding Festivities!
Celebrations Are Still On! Here Are Some More Pictures From PC-Nick's Post-Wedding Festivities!
Wedding is a beautiful celebration of the union of two souls in love. For lovebirds Nick Jonas and Priyanka Chopra, these celebrations are still on. The couple got hitched in Umaid Bhawan, Jodhpur and 'grand' is an understatement for the royal celebrations that took place.
Amidst these celebrations, the couple is juggling between their personal and professional commitments.
A few inside pictures from their post-wedding celebrations have made way on the internet and they are magical and dreamy! Have a look at the pictures.
Don't Miss 161 SHARES 12.5 K SHARES 186 SHARES 161 SHARES 1.1 K SHARES
title: Celebrations Are Still On! Here Are Some More Pictures From PC-Nick's Post-Wedding Festivities!

The couple got hitched in Umaid Bhawan, Jodhpur and 'grand' is an understatement for the royal celebrations that took place. After these celebrations, the couple is juggling between their personal and professional commitments.
